author: wsjcom
title: House Speaker Paul Ryan Plans to Retire
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”House Speaker Paul Ryan said Wednesday he would retire at the end of the term, delivering an unexpected jolt to the battle for control of the House in the midterm elections and setting up a new scramble among House Republicans to replace him.
The Wisconsin Republican said he had decided to leave after nearly 20 years in Congress because he had accomplished many of his legislative goals and wanted to spend more than one day a week with his children in Wisconsin.
...
